Text.Name: MakeLingSoil
Text.Desc: Exchanges one's own growth and nutrition to convert a parcel of land into Spiritual Soil.
Text.TargetDesc: Select an empty area on the ground.

Text.Name: MakeFatSoil
Text.Desc: Exchanges one's own growth and nutrition to convert a parcel of land into Fertile Soil.
Text.TargetDesc: Select an empty area on the ground.

Text.Name: LcBrokeHeartLock
Text.Desc: Costs intelligence to perceive the mind of a visitor or an outsider and act Playful to take down their guard.

Text.Name: LcClearHanyu
Text.Desc: As the same type of creature as a Flood Dragon, it can dispel the Cold Prison that the Flood Dragons leave behind to acquire a large amount of nutrition.

Text.Name: LcStopColdWave
Text.Desc: Uses the Phoenix's power from within to emit scorching breath and expel bitter cold.

Text.Name: LcStopHeatWave
Text.Desc: Uses the Flood Dragon's power from within to emit icy breath and expel scorching heat.

Text.Name: LcBaipiao
Text.Desc: Costs some intelligence to guess Traveling Merchant's mind and act Playful in order to curry favor. Maybe the merchant is not as cold-hearted as imagined.

Text.Name: LcSeeUnknown
Text.Desc: Grants Piercing Sight to an inner disciple so that they will be able to see through to an item's true features while at an auction.

Text.Name: LcOutspreadAttractive
Text.Desc: Sends them to an agency and shows auspicious signs at the cost of their own growth and stats in order to increase our appeal.

Text.Name: LcOutspreadStability
Text.Desc: Sends them to an agency and shows divine might at the cost of their own growth and stats in order to increase stability of the place.

Text.Name: Magic_YG_RealPower
Text.Desc: Rapidly burns the source of life to stimulate the original Yaoguai force in order to drastically increase the power of the artifacts and secret bodies. Release the skill again to stop this effect.

Text.Name: Magic_YG_RealRecover
Text.Desc: Rapidly burns the source of life to stimulate the original Yaoguai force in order to drastically increase the resilience, artifact Qi recovery rate and secret body True Qi recovery rate. Release the skill again to stop this effect.

Text.Name: Magic_YG_RealWisdom
Text.Desc: Rapidly burns the source of life to stimulate the original Yaoguai force in order to drastically increase the spell power, secret body attack accuracy, defense success rate, Qi barrier penetration and artifact suppression chance. Release the skill again to stop this effect.

Text.Name: Magic_YG_RealShield
Text.Desc: Rapidly burns the source of life to stimulate the original Yaoguai force in order to drastically increase the Qi barrier and secret body endurance. Release the skill again to stop this effect.
